text: 116th Street is a station on the IRT Lexington Avenue Line of the New York City Subway . Located at the intersection of 116th Street and Lexington Avenue in East Harlem . it is served by the 6 train . This station is for 6 trains After this station , the next stations will be 125th Street and 110th Street . Category:New York City Subway stations
title: 116th Street station (IRT Lexington Avenue Line)
